title: (07150) Andratx - 17 Carrer Madrid
description: Very spacious place where you can park day and night. Place of sand and gravel, without services, with shadows. Five minutes walk from downtown and with a Mercadona for shopping very close. There are four esplanades including one very illuminated. Very quiet neighborhood, ideal for sleeping.

title: (07150) Andratx - 3 Carrer Son Bosch

title: (07150) Andratx - 14 Polígon Son Mas

title: (07150) Andratx - 73 Calle General Bernardo Riera

title: (07150) Andratx - 1 Diseminado Palma Cr
description: Parking next to water station. During the week traffic by water truck. On Saturday, little on Sunday / holiday nothing! Supermarket and petrol station 1 km away. Mega quiet at night, direct access to hiking area and climbing area

title: (07150) Andratx - 2T Carrer S'estanyera
description: Free parking lot with lots of light

title: (07159) Andratx - 14 Camí des Castellàs

title: (07160) - 192A Urbanizacion Porto de Mar

title: (07160) Andratx - 192A Urbanització Porto Mar

title: (07160) Andratx - 152 Urbanització Porto Mar
description: Small free parking day and night. Very quiet area and close to the beach. It is made of gravel and has pine trees that provide shade.

title: (07160) Andratx - 193 Urbanització Porto Mar

title: (07157) Andratx - 46 Carretera des Port

title: (07157) Andratx - 4 Avinguda de Gabriel Roca i Garcías

description: Parking in front of the port paying the free day the night from 21h to 9h.

title: (07159) Andratx - unamed road

title: (07160) Andratx - 1U Camí Cala Blanca

title: (07160) Andratx - 6 Camí Cala Blanca

title: (07157) Andratx - 25D Avinguda de Gabriel Roca i Garcías

title: (07150) Andratx - Ma-10

title: (07160) Calvià - 437 Carrer 866
description: Empty car park. I was here on a Sunday. Not sure what it’s used for. Height restriction on entry. My van is 2.7M and was good. Over night looks good also. I may not stay overnight however. Many spaces and some good shade spots for summer sun.

title: (07160) Calvià - 864 Carrer 864
description: The parking lot is quite flat and very quiet and is about 300 m from the beach, from the Boulevard de Paguera, where there are shops and restaurants.

description:
17 kg , dryer 17 kg 


 4 parking now 20 10.22 free but basically blue zone

title: (07157) Port d'Andratx - 9 Camí Sant Carles

title: (07157) Andratx - Carrer Cala d'Egos
description: Quiet place with views of the Port. Near beach and climbing area.

title: (07160) Cala Fornells - 80 Carretera de Cala Fornells
title_short: (07160) Cala Fornells - 80 Carretera de Cala Fornells

description:
Only accessible by 4x4 vehicle. Broken road and stones.
alternative to sleep before going down to cove egos

title: (07196) Es Capdellà - 44 Carrer de l'Església
description: Quiet gravel parking area next to school on outskirts of town. Slept there overnight on weekend.  May be hectic on school mornings. lovely view of mountains and fields.

title: (07159) Andratx -

Only disadvantage, full south orientation, thus locked in the shade early in the evening .. And probably in the morning, not yet lying haha! But beautiful spot with some boats that wet in the creek, only possible access off 4x4!

title: (07160) Calvià - 6 Calle Ametllers /peguera
description: Here is free day / night parking. The place is not sensational .. But it can be parked in the shade and easy to access (all correct ;-)) Attention, I think this car park is popular at night as the day, places can to be difficult to have (especially in high season).

title: (07157) Andratx - 4 Urbanizacion Puig Marmacen Cl. 10
description: Quiet place for overnight. without services. Beautiful views of Cala Marmacen. Dirt and gravel floor, firm. The exit is reverse but very safe.

title: (07159) Andratx - Unnamed Road
description: Super quiet little parking lot, just the sound of critters, flat and right next to the ruins or almost.

title: (07160) Calvià - 6 Carrer Jacinto Benavente
description: Free parking in a very quiet street, with shade, 200 meters from the beach and near a supermarket, ideal for a couple of nights in summer.

title: (07157) Andratx - 84 Carrer 19
description: Small space for 2 vans For big cars no possibility to turn back. Approach a bit bumpy. Beautiful view of the opposite bay with sunset. Keep the place clean that the place will be preserved for us.

title: (07159) Andratx - 44A Carrer Cala es Conills
description: Nice place on foot of a small cove in front of the dragonera see you highway martifurgo

description: Parking for small campers a few minutes from the beach and cafés. some shade too, no facilities.

title: (07159) Sant Elm - Unnamed Road

Quiet little corner, spectacular view, perfect position for sunset and swimming (no beach). No extra service, Good climb to access but on road quality!

title: (07159) Andratx - 5 Carrer Xaloc
description: Shaded car park, close to the sea, very quiet. It is forbidden to go camping there but to spend the night there we had no problems.

title: (07184) Calvià - 332 Carretera Plana
description: Quiet place near the cemetery with a beautiful view of the mountains and the sea in the distance.

title: (07157) Andratx - 62 Carrer Pi

title: (07159) Sant Elm - 19 Carrer De Na Popia
title_short: (07159) Sant Elm - 19 Carrer De Na Popia

The access is almost only possible with 4x4 vehicles. Access to the sea over sharp rocks is difficult because of the steep cliff.

title: (07184) Calvià - Av des Capdella
description: This is an open parking lot with a half pipe for skaters. and a ten minute walk into town. especially interesting on mondays, since there is a little weekly market.

title: (07159) Sant Elm - 19 Carrer De Na Popia
title_short: (07159) Sant Elm - 19 Carrer De Na Popia
description: Location very very quiet, the road initially a little bad but then very well, I went with a motorhome and without problems.

title_short: (07183) Costa de la Calma - 7 Carrer Rei Jaume I

Water point. No other facilities.
Harder parking during school hours otherwise easy enough.

title: (07181) Palmanova - Carretera Andratx

title: (07181) Calvià - 6 Carrer de Còrdova
description: Large parking spaces behind Lidl. 10-15 minutes walk to Porto Novo. Not sure if you can stay the night.

title: (07181) Calvià - 63 Carrer Germans Pinzon
description: Free grassy lot with plenty of parking. Few minutes walk to the beach and all the bars/restaurants.

title: (07181) Calvià - 14 Carrer Coloms

title: (07181) La Porrassa - 369 Camino Porrassa /disseminat
description: Gas station with free water service

title: (07181) Magaluf - 22 Carrer Góngora

title: (07181) Calvià - 5 Carrer Miño

title: (07191) - 2 Ma-10
description: Big parking spot for 6-8 cars/vans under the trees which provides a shadow from sun. Very nice and calm spot for campers to sleep over or just to park and have a lunch. Nice sea view, but it's close to the main road

title: (07181) Portals Nous - 43 Carrer Miguel de Cervantes
title_short: (07181) Portals Nous - 43 Carrer Miguel de Cervantes

title: (07181) Badia de Palma - 19 Carrer Vista de la Mar
title_short: (07181) Badia de Palma - 19 Carrer Vista de la Mar

title: (07181) Calvià - 19 Carrer Cap Falcó
description: A calm resting area on sides of a country road, enough space for 5-6 cars (if you want to keep a bit of a distance, otherwise around 10 cars would fit in), a beautiful beach with shower and restrooms accessible within 2min of walking

title: (07181) Calvià - 19 Carrer Cap Falcó
description: Beautiful place to stay, surrounded by nature. Cala Falco.

title: (07181) Calvià - 30 Carrer Cap Falcó

title_short: (07181) Sol de Mallorca - 44 Avinguda Portals Vells

title: (07181) Portals Vells - 2A Calle Vista Alegre

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 134 Cami Sa Pedra de s'Ase
title_short: (07191) Banyalbufar - 134 Cami Sa Pedra de s'Ase
description: Torre del Verger parking area. Old watchtower with a viewpoint. Very quiet at night. In summer busy during the day, in winter quiet day and night. Spectacular views of the coast. There is a path down to a small stone cove. Do not go down with vehicles, the path is very narrow and steep.

title: (07181) Calvià - 831 Carrer 831
description: Shaded parking area no problem to park beach at 1.4km

title: (07181) Calvià - 3 Calle 823 Bendinat Centre
description: Municipal car park accessible 24 hours a day. Quiet at night. Large space available.

title: (07015) Palma -
description: Viewpoint with privileged views of Palma and the port. Quite quiet from 12:00 - 1:00 since cars usually come before to watch the sunset and be with friends. We spent a very quiet night here.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 3 Diseminado Estellencs Cr
description: Very large ground parking, with some trees, although they are small, they provide shade. Bañalbufar beach is small and made of stones. To get there you have to walk through the town and go down the streets for 15 minutes. It is a very curious cove!

title: (07181) Calvià - 43 Carretera Andratx
description: Free public parking 24h a 10min walk to the coves of Ses Illetes. Repsol next door with water and a picnic table. Quiet place to sleep.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 11 Camí des Molí
description: Here is a small shaded parking for vehicles (such as ours) that can not go down to the lower spot :-) We had a quiet night. Be careful not to arrive too late because the car park is full at night (many hotels). We were at the far end of the car park and had the chance to have a place close to a tree and suddenly a little room to take our meals outside, without disturbing the parking of other vehicles.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 16 Diseminado Palma Cr
description: Car park for the Cami de Baix hike

title: (07190) Banyalbufar - Ma-10
description: At the edge of the ma10, km n84 in front of the milestone, shaded area, quiet. The cars on the road are few at night, and we spent 2 night very quiet, cool. Small waste collection before leaving, it's clean for the next. Be careful when entering, small drop to pass slowly.

title: (07015) Palma - 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
title_short: (07015) Palma - 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
description: Street parking 700m from the Mirò museum and 50m from the stop for lines 46 and 47 which takes you to the port and downtown in 20 min. a bit busy but in the shade.

address.street: 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda

title: (07190) Esporles - Ma-1100 / Granja De Esporles
description: Free parking day and night next to Granja de Esporlas. Quiet place in the Sierra de Tramuntana.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - Ma-10

title: (07190) Son Trias - Unnamed Road

title: (07190) Esporles - 89 Diseminado Pol 9

Very spacious place next to Palacio de Marivent wall.

title: (07014) Palma - Carrer Castell de Bellver

title: (07015) Palma - 4 Carretera Dic de l'Oest

title: (07190) Esporles - 4 Carrer de s'Hort
description: Space for about 6 AC / Campers at the entrance of the town of Esporles. Very quiet, we have spent one night in a camper. Facing the road, a little busy especially at the beginning of the day. Civil Guard passed by and didn't say anything to us.

title: (07190) Son Coll -
description: Beautiful spot with a view for a van. In a curve of a lonely street.

title: (07015) Palma - 44D Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Parking in the blue zone in front of the port, ideal if you have to board the ferry early in the morning Flat and quiet area You can use the port toilets, open all night and quite clean

title: (07014) Palma - 2B Avinguda de Gabriel Roca

title: (07014) Palma - 29 Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: All parking spaces along the Palma harbor are free.

title: (07014) Palma - 45 Carrer Torrentó
description: Free public parking located in the Spanish village. Quiet at night and with the transit of cars during the day.

title: (07014) - 33A Avinguda de Gabriel Roca

title: (07011) - 30 Diseminado 2801- Son Flor

At the top is number 8 and direction Decathlon, there is another stop. This is 10 minutes by bus or less from the center. And if you have bicycles, It is much better, since from here you access the bicycle lane and even the center...

title: (07014) Palma - 3A Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Free public parking next to the restaurant. Next to the bike path of the Palma promenade

title: (07170) Nova Valldemossa - Ma-10
description: Small parking lot. Perfect sea view. Very quiet street.

title: (07011) Palma - 10 Camí de Jesús
description: Drinking water.

title: (07013) Palma - 39 Carrer de Sant Magí
description: Ferretería La Central, bottle of exchange gas of many types,

title: (07012) Palma - 8 Camí de l'Escullera

title: (07010) Palma - 2 Carrer de Ramon Nadal

title: (07010) Palma - 76 Carrer del General Riera
description: Cozy laundry with a variety of machines, including a washer and dryer for pets. Has Wi-Fi. It also has a coffee machine and snacks/drinks.

title: (07010) Palma - Unnamed road
description: Parking in Palma with large Campers can be very complicated. This is a free Carrefour car park and also with large spaces. There is a bus stop with which you are in the heart of Palma in 20 mins.

title: (07010) Palma - 10 Carrer de Francesc Fiol i Juan

title: (07120) Palma - 1A Carrer Parc Bit-1
description: Car park. It is very close to the center of Palma and is a good place to sleep if you visit the city. There is nobody on weekends. Without services

title: (07004) Palma - 1 Carrer San Francisco de Sales
title_short: (07004) Palma - 1 Carrer San Francisco de Sales
description: Public parking, nearby park and establishments. Little lit and very quiet to spend a good night near Palma.

title: (07004) Palma - 35A Carrer d'Eusebi Estada

title_short: (07009) Palma - 12 Carrer Gremi Selleters i Basters
description: Simple exchange of repsol propane and butane bottles. Opening times Mon-Sun 7.30 a.m.-9.30 p.m.

title: (07009) -
description: Large parking lot in front of the indoor pool. Overnight stays are tolerated without any problems.

title: (07006) Palma - 6A Avinguda Mèxic

title: (07006) Palma - 10 Carrer Ciutat de Querétaro

title: (07009) Palma - 8 Diseminado 5318

title: (07009) Palma - 529 Camí dels Reis
description: Free parking, very large, without services, only to spend the night near the green point that opens at 8 am

title: (07006) Palma - 21 Carrer del Callao
description: Quiet parking, near the port

title: (07006) Palma - 24-28 Carrer del Callao
description: Parking in a dead end street, perfect for a restful night. He always has a place. Close to the port.

title: (07007) Palma - 12-14 Carrer de Brotad
description: Humble and quiet neighborhood where to spend the night. No noise, close to the bike path that takes you to the center of Palma or the marina. The beach is 10 minutes walk. We have been in this location for 3 days without any kind of problem.

title: (07006) Palma - 8 Carrer del Marquès de la Romana
title_short: (07006) Palma - 8 Carrer del Marquès de la Romana

title: (07170) Valldemossa - Carrer Tramuntana
description: The port of Valldemossa has a very quiet parking lot at night. Very pleasant place a few meters from the water. Very difficult access for a motorhome over 7 m and 2.30 m high, almost impossible crossing and maneuvering in all the hairpins.!!

title: (07009) Palma - 1 Urbanització Parcel·l Urbanización son Llompart
title_short: (07009) Palma - 1 Urbanització Parcel·l Urbanización son Llompart
description: Gas station where we could refill water without problem.

title_short: (07008) Palma - 59A Carrer Mare de Déu de Montserrat

address.street: 59A Carrer Mare de Déu de Montserrat

title: (07009) Palma - 59A Carrer del Guadalquivir
description: A street with little traffic at the bottom of a park, attached to the train tracks, it is very close to a pretroest gas station that has the services of emptying water and filling. It has a nearby metro station, bus line and taxi rank.

title: (07009) Palma - 14 Carrer Gremi de Tintorers
description: Yet another public fountain. Parking probably in the second row.

title: (07006) Palma - 81 Carrer de Llucmajor
description: It’s just a parking lot but large, free and there are always spaces. It’s a 5 minute walk to the beach and marítimo, and near many bars, restaurants, and shops.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - Ma-1131
description: 1 flat and one sloping for van by the roadside. At the foot of the climbing routes and with a breathtaking view of the sea and the port of Valdemossa. Tourist traffic during the day.

title: (07007) Palma - 1 Carrer Pierre Lavedan
description: Parkstrasse, where many Womos are. It's quite far from downtown. Bus runs about 300 meters away. Meadows fenced left and right. You can hear a little street. Is lit. Otherwise there is nothing.

title: (07007) Palma - 24 Carrer Son Malferit-F
description: It is the parking of a Burguer open 24 hours. There is a little light but it makes the place safe.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 43 Ma-10
description: Free drinking water, to the right of the air pressure and water column is a garden hose that was allowed to be used.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 11C Avinguda Palma
description: A long, wide and free street to park 5 minutes walk from the center. All shade!! Before the bus stop area and the blue zone.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 12 Carrer Josep Coll Bardolet
description: Quiet parking in a street away from the center but 5 minutes from it. The review near the cemetery was closed for works so we found this site. There are several streets around with the option of parking but with a lot of inclination. This was towards the end quite level.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 201 Calle Venerable Sor Aina
description: Street parking, quiet and free. 5 mins walk to arrive at the lovely town, lots of cafes and restaurants, a beautiful view and the museum of Chopin.

title: (07007) Palma - 18 Camí Vell de Sineu
description: Quiet parking in the polygon, next to a park.

title: (07007) Palma - 19 Carrer de l'Illa de Rodes
title_short: (07007) Palma - 19 Carrer de l'Illa de Rodes
description: Fantastic location 80m walk to the beach.

title: (07007) Palma - 2 Carrer Illa de Còrsega
description: Parking near the beach. You can easily stay overnight. Close to restaurants and ice cream shops. Water fountains on the promenade to the left and right of the playground.

title: (07007) Palma - 14 Carrer de l'Illa de Malta
title_short: (07007) Palma - 14 Carrer de l'Illa de Malta
description: Street parking facing the sea. Five motorhomes tonight.

title: (07007) Palma - 28 Carrer de Trafalgar
description: Drinking water point on the promenade. Free

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 13 Avinguda Palma
description: Parking fee not closed. Old town nearby. No special services. Good for a night in a small van. Active municipal police therefore pay parking.

title: (07007) Palma - 8 Carrer de Josep Mascaro i Passarius
title_short: (07007) Palma - 8 Carrer de Josep Mascaro i Passarius
description: Online parking on the street, quiet and next to a park.

title: (07007) Palma - 33 Carrer de Miquel Forteza i Pinya
title_short: (07007) Palma - 33 Carrer de Miquel Forteza i Pinya

address.street: 33 Carrer de Miquel Forteza i Pinya

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 2D Carrer Àustria
description: Free parking to visit the town.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 5 Carrer Ermita Joan Mir
description: Very narrow road, you can pass by car or van. very quiet parking we have spent the night great, there are bathrooms and stone tables for picnic

title: (07007) Palma - 25 Camí de Son Fangos
description: Free drinking water. Slow

title: (07141) Marratxí - 3 Carrer Bartomeu Rosselló-Pòrcel
description: Parking in urganizacion near a school and shopping area (inexpensive restaurants) near the train station. calm

title: (07610) Palma - 44 Carrer Prol Denton
description: It is a parking area attached to the beach, passing cars. It is a street with access to the promenade that runs through the entire bay of Palma. The can beach is very close so it is ideal if you travel with dogs. I recommend this car park only if you want to be close to Palma.

title: (07193) Sa Coma - 1A Carrer des Gessamí
description: Picnic air with parking It is not clear if we have the right to sleep here but so far no worries! Despite the train line next door, very quiet place! Some walkers from time to time but quiet.

title: (07610) Can Pastilla - 9A Carrer de les Nanses
title_short: (07610) Can Pastilla - 9A Carrer de les Nanses
description: Small car park near the port, free and open 24 hours a day, directly on the seafront. Quite busy but we found a space quickly at the end of the day (June 2022).

title: (07610) Can Pastilla - 3 Carrer de Cèsar
description: Launderette 12kg, 16kg, 15 minutes drying.

title: (07611) Son Santjoan - 18 Zona Aeropuerto Son Sant Joan
title_short: (07611) Son Santjoan - 18 Zona Aeropuerto Son Sant Joan
description: Repsol gas station with LPG. One of the few gas station with LPG on the island.

title: (07141) Marratxí - 169 Urbanització ses Trempes
description: Very quiet area and close to the Poligono de Marratxi

title: (07141) Marratxí - 5 Carrer d'Alexandro
description: An area of pine forests in a family and quiet urbanization, there is plenty of parking and you can walk

title: (07610) Can Pastilla - Àrea d'intercanvi Aquarium
description: Parking in front of the aquarium with 1 public toilet (construction cabin type). Places with or without tree.

title: (07110) Bunyola -
description: Area to park near Sa Gubia to go climbing or Route, it is a parking lot of a restaurant that is apparently closed, it seems that it only opens in summer season. It has a sign that if you park and you are not a customer you pay 6e, he also told us that if you drink something later, it will be discounted. It is guarded with cameras. You can park in the upstairs or downstairs area, we arrived very late and moved downstairs to shower. We slept upstairs with no problem.

title: (07179) Deià - 13 Diseminado Valldemossa Cr
description: This place is just right next to the starting point if you are planning for a walk to “Sa Foradada”. Even you are not planning for the walk, you have to come and see the amazing subset just 1 min walk from here. There is a bar next and public toilet. Plenty of space for parking (enough for around 30 cars). At night most of the cars left so it is quiet and perfect to sleep.

title: (07610) Palma - 29 Carrer de Marbella
description: Very cheap gas station with water supply

title: (07179) Deià - 34E Carrer Arxiduc Luís Salvador
description: Parking on the road entering Deià. Comfortable to spend the night.

title: (07179) Deià - 5 Carrer Es Clot
description: Possibility of showering with hot water in the Can Boi refuge for a fee. Good service and attention.

title: (07141) Marratxí - 4 Calle Muntaña
description: Festival park parking

title: (07179) - 23C Carrer Arxiduc Luís Salvador
description: Parking at the entrance of Deià, without services but comfortable and accessible. There is room for about 10-12 cars. Quiet at night.

title: (07179) Deià - 6 Diseminado Valldemossa Cr
description:
Small parking in nature for the most part along the quietest route on the road that leads to deia cove.
Accesa be a little Tricky, Good turning possibility

title: (07179) Deià - 1A Carretera Sóller
description: Parking on the road. 4 spaces very close to Deià some inclination

title: (07141) Sa Cabaneta - 999 Carrer Casa del Poble
title_short: (07141) Sa Cabaneta - 999 Carrer Casa del Poble
description: Large convenient parking lot when you need to do laundry and groceries. Noisy so I do not recommend for the night. No height limit. Large motorhome ok

title: (07179) Deià - 5 Carrer Sa Cala
description: Parking at Cala Deia, possible to stay overnight, free from 7 p.m. to 9 a.m., great to be the last in the water and the first in the morning !!

title: (07179) Deià - 8 Carrer Francisco Mas
description: Parking very close to Deia. Perfect to go to dinner to the people taking a walk. In the morning if you get up early you can go down to the cove, where you can also spend the night. Very careful with the size of your vehicle that people park next to the road of the cove and the exit and entry is very complicated. Better to enter and leave at the first or last hour.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 10 Carrer del Tamarinde
description: Great and quiet spot in winter. I guess during season it will be crowded. people drive here to enjoy view on the sea and sunset. so in the evening there is activity but in the night I was the only one. one road west is a big garbage container.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 24 Carrer de l'Acàcia
description: Parking at the bottom of the street. Sea view.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 3 Carrer Lledoner
description: Quite large parking and with a lot of free space. On the road where you arrive earlier there is another car park with the same characteristics. It has containers.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 10B Carrer de l'Acàcia
description: Quietest spot in the region to stay overnight! Quite ok if you have to go to the airport early the day after :) Mirador Son Veri as a small vantage point within walking distance!

title: (07600) Palma - 26 Avinguda de Fra Joan Llabrés
title_short: (07600) Palma - 26 Avinguda de Fra Joan Llabrés
description: Along the road. Spent a relatively quiet night. From 6:00 a.m. it gets loud with car traffic. Some relatively flat. You have to stand very close to the curb, otherwise you will be outside the markings. Megapark, Ballermann 6, Bierkönig, Upper Bavaria and the beach can all be reached in about 6 minutes on foot. There are restaurants nearby

title: (07110) Bunyola - Carretera sa Comuna
description: Beautiful and quiet place on top of a mountain, you can get to this place from two sites and get some spectacular ones, seems like a good starting point for hiking. Closed from May 15 to October 15.

title: (07600) Palma - 3 Carrer Duna
description: Ballermann in 5 minutes, park in the head of a dead end

title: (07600) El Arenal - 21 Carrer Balears
description: Cheap place to do laundry. I recommend it!

title: (07110) Bunyola - Ma-2100
description: Small dirt road, close to a bend. Narrow access, just wide enough for a van. After 25m, the path makes a loop around a tree and we stayed there for 1 night. Flat, calm, a few vehicles and cyclists passing on the small road next to it.

title: (07600) Llucmajor - 23 Carrer Antoni Galmés
description: Having lived in El Arenal for several years, I know that there was always this parking lot. Actually there are 3 parking lots and in them there is AC and vans too. This one is wider and is better inclined, it also has a fence that gives more security. IS FREE. We have spent several nights and super quiet.

title: (07320) Santa Maria del Camí - 83 Diseminado Poligono 7
title_short: (07320) Santa Maria del Camí - 83 Diseminado Poligono 7
description: Gasoline where you can refill water for free

title: (07600) El Arenal - 303 Diseminado Sector 6
description: Water intake next to the laundry room, it is a typical gas station tap but with enough pressure. Very nice staff who, when asked if they could fill the tank, responded: of course, that's what it's for!?

title: (07199) Palma - 41 Diseminado 8737- Sa Casa Blanca
description: Picnic area with bins

title: (07600) Palma - 1 Diseminado 8307- es Pil.lari
description: 4 hectares of land with common services (toilets, showers, electricity, water, sewage, collector). bike rental. 2 km from Playa del Arenal and the airport 4). 24 hours all year.Visit us on facebook.Camp4cycle. However, it is a problem to get onto the pitch! There was no one there. Friendly camper colleagues let us on the pitch.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - Carrer de l'Oronella
description: Small picnic area, quiet with the sea close, quiet at night but a bit of people in the morning.

title: (07609) Puigderrós - 27A Carrer de la Milana
description: Parking lot for excursionists, free of charge now in January 2022, super calm, I only hear the shallow sea that breaks on the rocks about 100m below. Great view, no service.

title: (07609) Puigderrós - 6 Carrer del Voltor
description: Very quiet place, beautiful sea view. To take a bath 2 minutes on foot
